Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) show a great promise as new power generators with high energy conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: Decreasing operating temperature is critically requested for the further improvement in SOFC performance, in particular, for improving stability.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: Perovskite oxide of LaGaO3, doped with La and Mg exhibits the high oxide ion conductivity over wide P-o2 range; the value is higher than that of Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 by an order of magnitude at 773 K and useful for electrolyte of SOFC operating at intermediate temperature range.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: When LaGaO3-based oxide was used as the electrolyte of SOFC, the power density could be improved greatly, in particular in low temperature range.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: In this study, power generation property of SOFC using LaGaO3 electrolyte and also the improvement in power density of the cell by using a LaGaO3 thin film is also introduced.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the cell using,, LaGaO3 based oxide is as high as 0.6 W/cm(2) at 773 K.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte

Sentencas: This suggests that SOFC could be operable at temperature lower than 773 K. Tubular type cell stack using LSGM thin film is also introduced.
Titulo: Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using LaGaO3 Based Perovskite Oxide for Electrolyte
